title: Autonomous CloudOps using GenAI
description: The aim is to simplify the complex multi-dimensional space of CloudOps with the help of Generative AI.

title: Design Innovation Center
description: Ministry of Human Resource Development has proposed a National Initiative for Design Innovation in the Twelfth Plan. Under this initiative, 20 new Design Innovation Centers (DIC), one Open Design school (ODS) and a National Design Innovation Network (NDIN), linking together all these schools and other allied bodies such as leading institutions of Industry and academics, NGOs and government were set up.

title: Development of Security Search Engine
description: The project involves development of a information security search engine.

title: Gamily - Gamification Platform For All
description: Gamification of software engineering activities to increase interest in developers.

title: Github HSBC
description: Adoption of a technology into an organization needs acceptance and ease of use.

title: Meta
description: The aim is to simplify the complex multi-dimensional space of CloudOps with the help of Generative AI.

title: Qualcomm EdgeAi
description: Sustainable Edge Ai using Edge-Cloud Continuum

title: Smart Contracts for Open Source Software License Management
description: Study the usage of smart contracts for open source software license management and create a prototype implementation using RIPPLE or Ether.

title: UMETRIX - Usability Evaluation for Mobile Apps
description: UMETRIX to identify functional usability issues specific to mobile applications.

title: Virtual Labs
description: Online simulations of various science and engineering laboratory experiments available free and 24x7 to anyone and everyone.

title: Visual Acuity Testing using VR
description: The VREYE project aims to widen the scope of VR software systems in the medical domain and loops in various benefits of the technology in order to solve the problems that persist in the scope of testing and detection.
